bug.author: rkooo567
bug.summary: test_metrics::test_raylet_pending_tasks seem to be hanging when GCS actor management is on.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Discovered from CI. Not 100% sure if it due to GCS actor management. <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.

comments.comment: Couldn't reproduce, and it doesn't seem to occur from CI anymore. It probably could have been related to some other issues that were already resolved. Close it now.
